entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 08:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C

Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 2.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
